title: Fracture of upper end of tibia
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
block: Injuries to the knee and lower leg
category: Fracture of lower leg, including ankle
inclusion: Tibial: condyles with or without mention of fracture of fibula
Tibial: head with or without mention of fracture of fibula
Tibial: plateau with or without mention of fracture of fibula
Tibial: proximal end with or without mention of fracture of fibula
Tibial: tuberosity with or without mention of fracture of fibula
exclusion: bilateral involvement of knee and lower leg
injuries of: ankle and foot, except fracture of ankle and malleolus
injury of: muscle and tendon at or below ankle
